org.apache.cocoon.transformation

Class ZipItTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractSAXTransformer
      • org.apache.cocoon.transformation.ZipItTransformer

  • public class ZipItTransformer
extends AbstractSAXTransformer
    This transformer creates a new Zip file on disk. This transformer triggers for element in the namespace "http://apache.org/cocoon/zip-it/1.0". Example XML input: 
       
       
   
 The @filename specifies the file that should be created.
 The @name attribute specifies the filename of the entry in the zip file.
 The @src attribute is a URI providing the content for the entry.

 The result is a OK element.
